channel.title: Can't launch game, SteamStartup() failed
channel.description:
Hey everyone. So I've just installed Black Mesa, followed the instructions, download the Source SDK Base 2007. Every time Im trying to launch the game I get the following error:
[b]"SteamStartup() failed: SteamAPI_Init_Internal failed".[/b] Screenshot: ![](upload://ypcbIMUeHf9wSGmbnMfwkQpooD5.jpeg)
I've tried to reinstall both the SDK and the mod multiple times with no luck.
Source SDK Base 2007 is in : C:\Program Files (x86)\Steam\SteamApps\common\Source SDK Base 2007
BMS is in: C:\Program Files (x86)\Steam\SteamApps\SourceMods\BMS
Downloaded SourceSDK as well.
If it gives any clue, trying to run hl2.exe from the Source SDK folder gets the same error message, so I guess that means the error is comming from the SDK.
Any help will be appreciated.
